name: Egg White & Veggie Omelet
recipe: Whisk 3 egg whites. Sauté veggies in minimal olive oil. High protein, zero cholesterol.

name: Ragi Vegetable Dosa
recipe: Prepare batter with ragi flour and curd. Ragi fiber is excellent for heart health.

name: Whole Wheat Hummus Toast
recipe: Spread homemade hummus (low tahini) on toasted whole wheat bread.

name: Curd and Chole Salad
recipe: Mix chole with curd and veggies. Citrate in lemon dressing helps prevent kidney stones.

name: Lauki Moong Dal Soup
recipe: Pressure cook lauki and dal. Very low oxalate and flushes kidney crystals.

name: Masoor Dal with Brown Rice
recipe: Cook dal with garlic. Serve with brown rice to sweep out cholesterol.

name: Tofu & Mixed Veg Curry
recipe: Sauté tofu and veggies. Tofu is a zero-cholesterol replacement for Paneer.

name: Besan and Methi Chilla
recipe: Cook methi-besan pancakes. Methi helps reduce cholesterol absorption.

name: Karela (Bitter Gourd) Stir-Fry
recipe: Sauté sliced karela. Excellent for liver detoxification (Anjali's GGT focus).

name: Masala Buttermilk
recipe: Blend curd with water. Essential for hydration and UTI prevention.

name: Light Egg White Curry
recipe: Simmer egg whites in thin gravy. Lean protein safe for high cholesterol.

name: Low GI Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipe: Sauté high-fiber veggies in olive oil with black pepper.

name: Quinoa Khichdi
recipe: Pressure cook quinoa and dal. High fiber and low glycemic index.

name: Moong Dal Cheela
recipe: Grind dal into batter. Cook thin pancakes. High in plant protein and fiber.

name: Vegetable Dalia
recipe: Cook dalia with veggies. High fiber helps stabilize blood sugar and cholesterol.

name: Jowar Roti & Arhar Dal
recipe: Gluten-free Jowar rotis with high-protein garlic dal. Excellent for heart health.

name: Brown Rice & Rajma
recipe: Fiber-rich Rajma (no butter) with brown rice to support healthy lipids.

name: Tofu Bhurji (Soy Paneer)
recipe: Crumble tofu and sauté. Zero saturated fat alternative to Paneer Bhurji.

name: Soya Chunk Stir-fry
recipe: Boil soya chunks and sauté with veggies. High protein and heart-safe.

name: Overnight Oats with Apple
recipe: Soak oats in milk overnight. Top with apple. Beta-glucan and Pectin lower bad cholesterol.

name: Papaya & Sprouts Salad
recipe: Light dinner of papaya and sprouts. Enzymes in papaya aid liver health.
